creator: james@nameonthe.net
text:
Using the manager servlet with mod_webapp to install webapps isn't working.
I tested it using the normal HTTP connector and it works fine.
(partial - can't cut and paste) Stack trace below:

java.lang.NullPointerException
     at org.apache.catalina.connector.warp.WarpEngine.map(WarpEngine.java:75)
     at org.apache.catalina.core.StandardEngineValve
(StandardEngineValve.java:164)
     at org.apache.catalina.core.StandardPipeline.invokeNext
(StandardPipeline.java:566)
     .....

However, restarting apache enables it again, another case of the 404 webapp bug?
*** Bug 7032 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: remm@apache.org
pier@betaversion.org
text:
Due to the nature of the dual configuration of Apache's HTTPD.CONF and 
Tomcat's SERVER.XML, the manager application cannot be used.
